name: Kitsu-Kube
description:
Help guide a mythical kitsune to get back to her homeworld, by shaping the very planes she walks upon. KitsuKube is an experimental game that takes the fundamental concepts of a traditional Rubix cube and built upon this to create a refreshing and yet complex puzzle game. 

Get to the well to move to the next world, but you must collect the key first, shift faces into their correct positions, avoid the monsters, get coins and plan accordingly to get out of the dimension you're in. 

There are 3 levels in total, each increasing in difficulty, can you solve them all? 

Made by a Team of four,  over a six month period as a University project, developed by: 

Daniel Oldham - (Programmer) Portfolio: https://www.dangodev.com/

Iain Farlow - (Programmer) Portfolio: https://iain2019.github.io/

Blake Smales - (Designer) Portfolio: https://www.blakesmales.co.uk/

Kieran Morris - (Designer) Portfolio: 

Feedback on the project is very much appreciated <3
